item.title: All 4 Short Films By Christopher Nolan Explained
item.description: Christopher Nolan is one of the most famous directors in the world, however, his lesser-known four short films show a different side to his career.

item.title: The Lost Children: Where Are The Kids Now?
item.description: Netflix's documentary, The Lost Children details the search for four siblings after a plane crash in Colombia's rainforest and what happened after.

item.title: 2024 Movie Martin Scorsese Loved Reveals The Year's Most Overlooked Horror
item.description: Martin Scorsese has expressed his love for a relatively obscure 2024 film, proving that it is one of the most overlooked horror flicks of the year.
